description: Detects execution of "reg.exe" to disable security services such as Windows Defender.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
John Lambert (idea)
elhoim
name: Security Service Disabled Via Reg.EXE
query: (process.command_line.text:*reg* AND process.command_line.text:*add* AND process.command_line:/.*[Dd]\ 4.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Vv]\ [Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt].*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ii][Dd][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Mm][Ss][Mm][Pp][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Nn][Ii][Ss][Ss][Rr][Vv].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy][Hh][Ee][Aa][Ll][Tt][Hh][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ss][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ee].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Uu][Ss][Oo][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Dd][Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Dd][Nn][Ii][Ss][Dd][Rr][Vv].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Dd][Nn][Ii][Ss][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Ss][Vv][Cc].*/ OR /.*\\\\[Ww][Uu][Aa][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv].*/))
